Title: Godzilla vs. Megalon
Writer: Jun Fukuda, Takeshi Kimura (story "Gojira tai Uchu Kaij√ª"), Shin'ichi Sekizawa (story)
Actors: Katsuhiko Sasaki, Hiroyuki Kawase, Yutaka Hayashi, Robert Dunham
Plot: The undersea nation of Seatopia sends the gigantic Megalon to destroy the world above - and it's up to Godzilla and a size-shifting robot, Jet Jaguar, to defeat him.
